Paragraph: On the other hand , benzothiadiazole ( BT ) containing the electron - withdrawing imine ( -CvN- ) nitrogen has been widely used as a strong acceptor in D-A copolymers.

| --- |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| Property Name |

| electron-withdrawing imine (-CvN-) |
| nitrogen |

Explanation:

* "D-A copolymers" is not a material property, but a type of material.
* "benzothiadiazole (BT)" and "electron-withdrawing imine (-CvN-)" are specific material properties.
* "nitrogen" is a chemical element that can be a property of a material.
